alert.note: Alert for South Central Elko County; White Pine County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 1:53PM PDT by NWS Elko
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern White Pine and southern Elko Counties through 230 PM PDT... At 153 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 13 miles southeast of Ruby Lake. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern White Pine and southern Elko Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: South Central Elko County; White Pine County
